'MethodTemplateName=VBMain; Dim res As Item Dim inn As Innovator
Function Main() As Item 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
Dim thisItemType As String = Me.GetType() Dim thisItemId As String = Me.GetID() inn = Me.getInnovator()
' get all top DocNodes linked to this Document Collection Dim amlCmd As String = "<Item type='Document Collection DocNodes' action='get' serverEvents='0' " amlCmd = amlCmd & "select='sort_order,source_id(id,name,generation),related_id(id,name,generation)' >" amlCmd = amlCmd & "<source_id>" & Me.GetID() & "</source_id>" amlCmd = amlCmd & "</Item>"
Dim topDocNodeItems As Item = inn.newItem("","") topDocNodeItems.loadAML(amlCmd)
topDocNodeItems = topDocNodeItems.apply() Dim i As Integer For i=0 To topDocNodeItems.getItemCount()-1
Dim allChildIds As String = fn_GetNodeIdsOfHierarchyDown(topDocNodeItems.getItemByIndex(i).getRelatedItem()) ' add id of top docNode (type = Document Hierarchy Node) allChildIds = "'" & allChildIds.Replace(",","','") & "'" & ",'" & topDocNodeItems.getItemByIndex(i).getProperty("related_id","") & "'"
res = fn_UpdateAllChildItemsWithDataFromDocCollection(Me,allChildIds) If res.isError() Then Return res Next i
Return Me End Function
'----------- Private Function fn_UpdateAllChildItemsWithDataFromDocCollection (ByRef docCollectionItem As Item, ByRef childIds As String) As Item Dim SQLstr As String Dim updateValue As String Dim tableName As String = "[" & CCO.DB.GenerateTableName("Document Hierarchy Node") & "]"
SQLstr = "UPDATE " & tableName
SQLstr = SQLstr & " SET " & tableName & ".header_item_id_string='" & docCollectionItem.getID() & "'" SQLstr = SQLstr & "," & tableName & ".header_item_type='" & docCollectionItem.GetType() & "'"
' inherit data from docCollectionItem updateValue = docCollectionItem.getProperty("name","Null") If updateValue <> "Null" Then updateValue = "'" & updateValue & "'" SQLstr = SQLstr & "," & tableName & ".header_item_name=" & updateValue
Dim propsToCopy As String() = {"managed_by_id","team_id"}
Dim i As Integer For i=0 To propsToCopy.Length-1 updateValue = docCollectionItem.getProperty(propsToCopy(i),"Null") If updateValue <> "Null" Then updateValue = "'" & updateValue & "'" SQLstr = SQLstr & "," & tableName & "." & propsToCopy(i) & "=" & updateValue Next i
SQLstr = SQLstr & " WHERE " & tableName & ".id in (" & childIds & ")" res= Me.getInnovator().applySQL(SQLstr) If res.isError() Then Return res
Return Me End Function
'----------- Private Function fn_GetNodeIdsOfHierarchyDown (ByRef nodeItem As Item) As String
nodeItem.setAttribute("relationshipName","Document Hierarchy") res = nodeItem.apply("Get ItemIDs of Structure Down") 'generic method from Common Utitities If res.isError() Then Return ""
Return res.getResult() End Function
